___onActions.description: Names of the actions that trigger de-authentication.

___token.description: Use the given OAuth2 access token (instead of using the OAuth provider).

___flag.description: The name of the flag indicating the current authentication state.

___resource.description: The name under which to publish the OAuth access token.

___onActions.description: Names of the actions that trigger OAuth2 authentication.

___provider.description: The OAuth2 endpoint configuration. If not set, uses application config.

___sessionStorageId.description: A unique identifier for storing temporary information inside the browser's sessionStorage

___url.description: The URL of the OAuth flow provider's entry point.

___scope.description: The authorization scopes to request from the provider.

___accessTokenUrl.description: The location where the application can obtain an access token.

___redirectUrl.description: The URL the OAuth provider should redirect to.
